mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from review where hotel_id = #{hotel_id}
mapper.update: update review set score= #{score},context = #{context} where review_num = #{review_num}
mapper.select: SELECT r.hotel_id, r.review_num, r.userid, r.score, r.created, r.context, s.count, s.ave FROM review r, ( SELECT hotel_id, COUNT(*) AS count, AVG(score) AS ave FROM review GROUP BY hotel_id ) s WHERE r.hotel_id = s.hotel_id AND ${searchKey} LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ORDER BY r.review_num DESC
